title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A timeless Italian classic featuring al dente spaghetti tossed with a creamy egg and Pecorino Romano sauce, finished with crispy pancetta.
instructions: Boil spaghetti until al dente. Fry pancetta until crispy. Whisk eggs with cheese, combine with hot pasta and pancetta, season with pepper, and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Tender marinated chicken grilled to perfection, simmered in a rich, spiced tomato cream sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 2 hours. Grill until charred. Simmer tomatoes, cream, and spices into a sauce, add chicken, and cook for 15 minutes.

title: Beef Bourguignon
summary: A French stew of slow-cooked beef in red wine with mushrooms, onions, and aromatic herbs.
instructions: Brown beef, deglaze with wine, add vegetables and herbs, then simmer for 3 hours until tender.

title: Vegetarian Quinoa Bowl
summary: A healthy mix of quinoa, roasted vegetables, and a zesty lemon-tahini dressing.
instructions: Cook quinoa. Roast vegetables at 400°F for 20 minutes. Mix tahini with lemon juice and drizzle over the bowl.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
summary: Decadent individual cakes with a molten chocolate center, perfect for dessert lovers.
instructions: Melt chocolate and butter, mix with eggs, sugar, and flour. Bake at 375°F for 10 minutes.

title: Pad Thai
summary: A Thai stir-fry with rice noodles, shrimp, peanuts, and a tangy tamarind sauce.
instructions: Soak noodles, stir-fry shrimp, add sauce ingredients, toss with noodles, and top with peanuts.

title: Roasted Salmon with Dill
summary: Juicy salmon fillets roasted with fresh dill and a lemon-garlic glaze.
instructions: Marinate salmon with oil, lemon, garlic, and dill. Roast at 400°F for 12-15 minutes.

title: Mushroom Risotto
summary: Creamy Arborio rice cooked with sautéed mushrooms and Parmesan cheese.
instructions: Sauté onions and mushrooms, add rice, gradually stir in stock, finish with Parmesan.

title: Lamb Tagine
summary: A Moroccan stew with tender lamb, dried apricots, and warm spices.
instructions: Brown lamb, add spices and stock, simmer with apricots for 2 hours.

title: Tiramisu
summary: An Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.
instructions: Dip ladyfingers in espresso, layer with whipped mascarpone and sugar, chill, and dust with cocoa.
